reviews_data.review_text: Wonderful bookstore!!!! Great variety, cozy atmosphere.

It was my second time going to a Barnes and Noble. I love the wide variety of books that they have, ready to satisfy all kinds of readers. The employees we talked to were very nice too and everything was well organized and clean.
Great store with a big selection, only downside is that parking is always difficult, which I think is just a result of being at this location.
Not a lot of Urban novels but still a lot of books.
Beautiful store and selection! Parking was not great, had to park a long way from the store. Long line to check out and not enough help. The employees I encountered were very nice.

A lovely bookstore with a friendly and helpful staff.  I've had to wait a few minutes at the customer service desk, but only because it was a busy time or the clerk was off helping another customer.  And they've always been very thorough whenever I've asked for help with finding something.  Also love the Baristas at the Caf√©. An all around great place to go!
Very helpful staff. Clean building and it's near and organized. If they can't help you someone most definitely can.
I love the 2 story B&N locations. Best one in 100 miles of me.
So nice place
Great clearance section for kids books.
Did not find the How to Buy a House Book...will have to order it. Great coffee treat while browsing.
Beautiful and inviting environment for readers
Great staff
Great selection and help if needed. A whole rack of books various subjects for $3.00. Plus coffee etc  Location Sharon and Colony.
My wife was shopping for a specific calendar.  The clerk was unduly snooty.  The clerk very clearly made erroneous judgements regarding comparative socio-economic status.    Sad.
Great selection
Always a great selection of books and the cafe has a great selection
Many books to see and read. If you like buying and reading books then it is the place for you.
B&B is my favorite spot. Great books. Only one suggestion. The seats are dirty.
Nice-sized barnes & noble. Good selection of books and games
Always super clean and in order! I drive about 40 minutes to come here and it's definitely worth the drive!
What else is there to say!!  It's books baby!!!

This Barnes & Nobles is fantastic. I whent in looking for a book, that despite my doubts, I was really hoping they would have in stock. The book is Neil Gaiman's Coraline. My friend and I were immediately greeted my a worker upon our entrance. She quickly found the book, and politely directed us to the 2nd floor to retrieve it. We got a little lost looking for it, and of course in true book shopping fashion, ended up filling our arms with more find than we were aiming for. We even found ATEEZ' most recent EP (ATEEZ THE WORLD EP.1 :MOVEMENT)! I was pretty excited, after purchasing all our finds; we spent the afternoon unboxing our albums and reading though a few books; before checking out their vinyl collection then heading out. It was a great trip to the boom store, the are is lovely and honestly, I couldn't imagine a better time!
This store is gorgeous and it has 2 levels! The staff members are helpful and welcoming!
Excellent customer service and good selection for books.
You can read, have, coffee enjoy. Sales people are wonderful üòä

I bought too many things due to their ability to have all the right books, games, and puzzles for anyone and everyone to enjoy. I will absolutly come here again! (Once I finished all the books I bought! üòÑ)
Best place to find gifts for everyone.
Great service!
Very decent for Charlotte
Really nice store in a great location near other places to shop or eat. Nice layout and Staff seem friendly. Decent size parking in front.
Great employee's! Tight parking, worth the great selections of books!
Love this bookstore!!!

Very clean and quiet with a wide selection of books on two floors. Would be nice to see their religion section expand with more Eastern Religion selections. Five shelves of content do not do the wealth of knowledge available justice.

Very nice bookstore with overwhelming options to choose from. They only had one book I wanted but were happy to put the other on hold for me & they called me when it was ready. Not many people inside, more of a community feel (which was great to me). Customer service was very nice about helping me locate what I needed; clean bathroom.

I was at Barnes,,&,,,nobles today get some books. I have a Starbucks gift card I purchased  from Starbucks  in afton  ridge in concord for 60.00 they informed  me I couldn't  use my gift card at there store at the Starbucks.  I was exestimley  üò° UPSET. I called Starbucks customer service  line no answer. Why didn't Barnes and nobles take my card. Wsiting on answer from them.
Love this library very much with collection of books and toys of different age groups!!
Very knowledgeable staff. Clean area to read and hang out
This is my happy place.  Update: This is still my happy place.
It's Barnes & Noble
It has pretty amazing books, their vinyl collection is kind of lacking though
The best one I have been to.
Friendly service, books are spaced out over two floors, lots of room for sitting and sipping coffee.
This location has a nice flow of categories and privacy for reading.
Wonderful staff and they always have fun displays that help me discover new authors
Friendly, courteous staff that were very helpful. Nice atmosphere including a cafe
Wonderful ambiance. Knowledgeable and helpful staff. So many great selections. New to the area and loved finding this spot. Will definitely be back.

(Translated by Google) It is one of my favorite places to enjoy a coffee ‚òï. And search among its varied collections of books üìö and magazines. Adional, also good music üé∂. I recommend it  (Original) Es uno de mis favoritos lugares para disfrutar un caf√© ‚òï. Y buscar de entre sus variadas colecciones de libros üìö y revistas. Adional, tambi√©n buena m√∫sica üé∂. Lo recomiendo

Very clean, and big. Not very customer service oriented. Not saying that it really should be considering the fact that it's self-serving. Just not what I hoped it would be especially since it had a coffee shop. I thought CSRs would be walking around giving suggestions or opinions about book titles. Greeting customers, I mean it's South Charlotte things are usually pretty upscale on that side of town. Cashier could have been a little friendlier. Nothing makes a customer feel welcomed like a smile. I definitely recommend you check this location out. Great selection.
Great selection.
The store is very clean and well stocked.  Excellent selection.
Customer service was outstanding . HOWEVER NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE TO FIND A PLACE TO PARK
Books!

Busy location, there was room to social distance which is awesome due to the pandemic. I was having trouble locating a Kevin Hart book and the receptionist was able to help find that book quickly. Great experience here
First visit to this location. It was a pleasant experience. The one associate I encountered was friendly
They have loads of books and little gifts for everyone.
Website said holiday hours were until 9pm but they closed at 7pm. No one was there to apologize or acknowledge the discrepancy, no note on door. Very disappointed.
Great experience. Parking a little challenging. However, staff was patient, courteous, and helpful despite the busy holiday season.
Prices high don't want to go upstairs to look at books. I am a senior
Great books and great gifts!  Barnes &Noble is a Charlotte treasure.

I  live walking distance. Came in for some Starbucks coffee. Who knew they had SOUP AND SANDWICHES? Reasonably priced. Dog Friendly. Good magazine section. Gifts and books. Hope this place does not go out of business anytime soon.
Friendly staff were helpful and seemed happy to be there.
A great bookstore is a marvelous gift!
One of my favorite locations
Good selection of books and gifts in a great location.
Very friendly, helpful employees! Nice place to drink coffee, read a book. Nice clean, quiet place!

Was looking for a book that because I wanted to know what the inside looked like They ended up not having in stock, but one of the employees (I wish I would have looked at her name) was exceptionally helpful. She was familiar with it and able to find one similar and explain what it looked like. And then went out of her way to try to find a location where it might be in stock.
Everybody was so nice and all the books are in perfect condition and they're all in order. the people that work there are so nice. And it's a super good place to work and study.
Great bookstore. Clean, organized, best selections
So disappointed that they were remodeling.  Terrible time of year. Asked a staff member how long it would take. He shrugged, didn't have a clue.
Barnes and Noble our favorite  bookstore in Charlotte NC. Always a great experience.
Great selection, awesome customer service, so very very helpful ... and the Starbucks in this location was top notch, so yummy
Staff were friendly and kinda professional

Clean, friendly staff and has a Starbucks inside. The toilet is located upstairs and could have been cleaner but it was well stocked.  Starbucks inside - it is what you expect from visiting a Starbucks. Only had one staff person working there when I went but she was efficient and didn't screw up my drink which has happened before at other locations.  The store has little books and seats for you to read. The selection was decent in each section and what you can't get, you can order online and have it delivered.  I would go here again.
‚òÜHas books. ‚òÜHas coffee. ‚òÜWill always push the discount card üòÜ
Amazing customer service good people good smiles

I love to frequent this barnes and noble. Its huuuge compared to the one on Pineville Matthew's rd in the Arboretum. It's 2 stories! They have tons of books to choose from and the staff are always so helpful and lovely! Definitely recommend checking this B&N out!

Love this Barnes and Noble, also really love the Starbucks inside. I believe the worker I always encounter is named Dannielle and she is always working so hard but also super pleasant every time, she takes long lines in stride and she's a wonderful employee‚ù£ Thank you, Danielle
Great atmosphere
Books may save us all.
Excellent customer service üëç
Wife likes this bookstore, coffee bar took a minite and the nice chairs were right next to a trash can... Employees and customers were pleasant to be around
This is a wonderful shop!!
Drink delicious coffee while they shop for books, the concept is copies by every book store at this point but it works!

I'm a big fan of the 2 story Barnes and Nobles. I don't feel crowded while I'm looking at books. Feels cozy, yet wide open if that makes sense. They have a nice deli area and a large selection of writing 'things' like pens, journals, bookmarks, cards, calendars, etc...Everything was neat and clean and smelled like coffeeüòä. Excellent selection of books from all genres. Decent selection of board games too. The only part of the store that felt a teensy bit like it didn't fit was the large movie area. It just felt like a huge space that was not very full. The cashier was super friendly and kind. All in all, great experience. Oh and parking was easy!

(Original) ÈÄôÊõ∏Â∫óË∑üÂ•Ω‰πÖ‰ª•ÂâçÁöÑÂç∞Ë±°Áõ∏Âêå ÊâÄ‰ª•È°ßÂÆ¢‰πüÊòØÂæàÂ∞ë ÊÉ≥ËëóÈñãÂ∫óÊàøÁßü ÂÜ∑Ê∞£ Âì°Â∑• Êõ∏Á±ç ÈÄ£ÈéñÂ∞±ÊòØÈú∏Ê∞£ ‰∏çÁÆ°ÊÄéÊ®£ Â≠∏Êó•Êú¨Á≤æÁ∑ª Â≠∏Ë™†ÂìÅÂ§öÂÖÉ Á∂≤Ë∑Ø ÂØ¶È´î Ë°ùÊìä......
My favorite book store hands down, and the staff is always so nice.

Had not been here for years due to health issues, but my goddaughter is an avid reader. She wanted some quality time AT B&N, so off we went. It was well worth the visit, customer centered service. Nice to have a place where we can still touch the books, flip through a few pages and that smell that only book lovers can appreciate.
Everyone so nice and extremely helpful.

This barnes and noble is big and they do have a large variety of material. However they are running with very low staff so if you need help finding a book it can take a while. Check out lines can also be pretty long and slow to get through since there is only ever 1 cashier.
There was no one at customer service. When the cashier asked "Did you find anything you need?" I said no and even though I told her what book I didn't find she ignored me.
Honestly, the best barnes and noble I've ever been to. Staff is so nice, both in the book store and Starbucks. The place is always organized and neat.
It's always friendly and clean. And the employees a very nice and professional. Great place to visit and relax and enjoy the quiet.
Helpful, friendly staff helped me** find the 4fperfect gift for a two year old.
Books are in chaos.  No order and very difficult to locate.  Zero staff to ask for assistance.

I love Barnes & Nobles! It is a joy to be there. üòå I'm an avid reader and own more shows than clothes so I'm totally biased! üôÉ  I do have to say the books are still very expensive, so sometimes I'd see a book that I have marked for shopping at Amazon  for twice as much. üòï But it's such a nice place to hang out and their in store coffee shop has been my replacement for Starbucks since the pandemic started ü§®
I'm glad that this store survived.  Nice selection, great customer service.
The staff friendly, and the location is great. They have that unmistakable bookstore smell which I love. Go in, grab a coffee, and get lost in literature

I was just in your South Park store located in Charlotte NC where I had the worse experience ever at a Barnes and noble store. A lady by the name of Cynthia was assisting me and was very sweet and helpful. She apparently needed some assistance and called for help and at that point an associate showed up told her to cancel out of her screen and through the book at me and said here you can go now! Her attitude belonged at a fast food restaurant where that kind of service is expected! My entire interaction with this associate was beyond horrible and I expect in today's time you need to be able to keep your customers! With the way I was treated by this associate I will not return to that store! The store manager Michael attempted to handle the situation and provided me with your district manager contact info. I highly suggest putting your employee through a customer service class so she learns how to interact in a civilized manner!!
Great bookstore
Not bad
Very helpful staff. Teacher discount was a bonus!
The best in Southpark! I love walking here with my kids, they love going to pick out new books! Great staff! Very clean, and wonderful atmosphere!
I love barnes and noble. Wonderful books, magazines and cafe. Helpful and pleasant employees. Would love to see more vegan and other dietary specific items in the cafe.
Helpful staff
Books

I go here all the time just to get out. They are always kind, well managed and organized, with an abundance of wonderful literature and tons of fun extras. So long as I live in this part of Charlotte, they'll be my go-to. ‚ô° Thanks, from an isolated book lover!
Good books and nice staff
Absolutely incredible experience while there every single time. Staff is incredible.
Great selections for kids
Great place to read and get stuff done in the coffee shop

Love this location. Normally I get my coffee here, but this morning the lady barista was very snappy.Correcting me when I wanted to change my drink. Probably she had a bad day, but she shouldn't talk to customers like that.
Always friendly and helpful. My daughter and I come here a few times a month for some of quality time to together . They have to alot of books and novelties the other stores don't.
Always a good place for books!
Friendly, clean, nice staff and had the books I wanted.
Clean and upscale
I was very quiet and had lots of books. I found everything I was looking for and looking forward to coming here more often.

One of the better Barnes and Noble stores in the state. Layout is fantastic with lots of sale items. Parking lot is cramped and doesn't seem to be big enough for modern cars, so be careful coming and going from here and be mindful!
The staff was helpful and a quiet environment.
Beautiful bookstore.  My kids love going there!!
Closed early and didn't update site.
Found some interesting books. Loved it
Was looking for a new calendar a bit late.  Not much selection but my bad for waiting.
You can find your favorite books
Great floor plan, super friendly service, and a wonderful selection from which to choose. Can't ask for more than that.

Great customer service. The cashier ended up walking me right to the spot where the book I was looking for was located. When I told her the price was different than what was listed online she took the time to investigate as to why & determined that there was a slight difference in the copies that caused the price difference.  I really feel like she wanted to help identify the book & realize that there was a problem & work to find a solution & remedy to it. Look forward to going back again soon!
Only place I could find the settlers of catan expansion walked in only took a few minutes since I purchased it online for store pickup.
Great book store.
Great selection of books and a kind, courteous staff.
Awesome place
Placed my order online. Went into store to pick up my items.  My order was ready for pickup and cashier verified all items were what I wanted. Always polite and helpful cashiers at this location.
Friendly staff
This store allows us to sit for a while. It is quiet place to work. Never a bookstore I didn't like.
I could spend all day here, I love book stores.
ridiculously overpriced bUt GrEaT sElEcTiOn
my home
Quick in and out with a activity book for my grandson.
Location at Carolina place mall is always well stocked. Staff is always friendly

Not many people, and of course they had to reset the whole store, so almost nothing is where it used to be. Looking for specific author and only one book in the entire store. He is either immensely popular or they don't get many books by this guy. And they wonder why people go to Amazon/Kindle instead! Yes, I did pick the book up, but it wasn't my first choice. Unfriendly looking woman at table for some organization, as I came in. Followed my every move to the escalator. Barnes and Noble is a strange place now.
The lady cashier was very kind, helpful and friendly.
Love  Barnes and noble. My favorite location. Great selection of books.
Great place for magazines
It's nice to be able to roam thru books again. Can't smell them because of masks,wait til get home for that.!
Love the book
Didn't have the book I wanted. Parking is a joke.
Great place to vibe with the kids. Books activities, the best hot coco and wonders.
Quick check out and pleasant atmosphere
Needed help......no staff available
Great selections, very entertaining.
Great customer service helpful and friendly üëç
Best Barnes & Noble in the Charlotte area, very wide selection.
I love the books that they have. Good variety. Starbucks is inside so you can grab some coffee while searching for a good book!
Staff was very helpful in finding a book for me.
Good selection and easy to find parking
Great bookstore
Good hideout. Staff is great.
Selection felt a bit limited, but that may be more to the open air store design. Staff was knowledgeable and helpful.
Huge store. We were a little disappointed because my kids love manga, they don't have much of a selection. Nice staff though and very helpful.
Super helpful staff. Well stocked and organized.
My favorite store! Great selection,  lots of bargain books and sales. The staff are very helpful helping find titles I'm interested in.  Found three books today! üìöüëç
Clean, peaceful and more than enough floor to go around since we can't socialize lol

This is a nice clean location that also has a coffee shop inside like most Barnes and Nobles. However like most it is also overpriced. The staff here are very friendly and helpful. Currently during covid they are always masks. I recommend calling ahead to make sure they have the book that you want. There were not a lot of people browsing or just hanging out when I went towards the evening about an hour before close.
Well stocked, orderly, most books and magazines imaginable.  Pricey.
Great bookstore, friendly staff.
Selection of books was lacking and the staff seemed disinterested.  The bright spot was the Starbucks coffee stand, where both the sandwich and service was good.
Fantastic staff ready to help and provide their unique tastes ... clean environment
Great selection
Always have what I'm looking for
Hamburgers are fantastic.. fire fires are fire!!! Onion rings were awesome..chicken wings too small for the price..definitely go back..

Worst customer service ever!  I purchased a textbook at this location due to temporarily closure of my university library. I placed my order online and I was told to come to this Barnes & Noble location for curbside pick up.  One of the older lady's that work at the store which I believe her name is ( Candace) from the name on my receipt. She came out to bring me the book and she was extremely rude to the point where it was borderline racism. She ask me to show her my order number which when I attempted she put her arm out and told me not to come any closer. I know we are social distancing but some people are using it as excuse to be racist. I will not return to this location!
Favorite place to get books, helpful staff
Nice place to recharge myself üëç

Took kids to Barnes & Nobles today to use gift cards.  Always amazed how we can go to a book store and come away with everything except books.  I think that is more of a personal management problem though.  Store is large, nice, clean, etc....they have a Starbucks inside and there is always a crowd sipping coffee and perusing magazine and newspapers.  They have events for kids as well.  üëçüèª
Love the smell of all the books and magazines and coffee as soon as you walk in. Is this the last big bookstore in Charlotte? Maybe we should patronize it just to keep it.
The staff is always helpful, they are passionate about books and they have great recommendations when you are stuck on what you should read next. The staff at Starbucks are equally phenomenal.
Awesome location, limited parking,  excellently organized
Great selection. Knowledgeable staff.
Its good great prices lots of books in the all price range
Great customer service at the BN Cafe and front end cashier was friendly and engaging.
Never been to this location before last week and it was amazing. Great help and had some things that i havent seen at previous locations.
Easy place to find and get to in downtown area. Starbucks inside with a great selection of bakery items and cheesecakes.
Love this place
Books
Friendly atmosphere, great customer service
A great place to buy books of course. My son loves to read so we go there to find great content books.
Great customer service!!!!
Love the atmosphere and the selection of reading.
Love it
Lots of books. Kind of expensive
Two stories of absolute cognative paradise to be had with great customer service.

Really awesome B&N, I have never visited one with 2 floors and this one is quite enjoyable. I only give it 4 stars because the lounge to eat and read is very small. Even though it is 2 floors, it seems to have a smaller selection compared to other Barnes and Noble locations.  Service was great and the employees are very nice and kind.  It's a very nice and quaint store.
Great store.  Friendly and helpful staff.
they always have what I'm shopping for
(Translated by Google) Yes okay  (Original) Si okey
Great place to read and have a good time.
Big box bookstore, polite staff, good selection. Honestly, I only go here if my local used book store doesn't have want I want.
Really nice book store and the staff is very friendly and helpful.
Friendly Staff. Warm cozy nooks for reading.
Great gift shopping!
Customer service at this location is excellent. I was pleased with the friendliness of the staff and the merchandise available. I definitely enjoyed my visit and will return in the future.

This is one of my favorite places to spend time.everyone from the Starbucks employees to the cashiers are some of the nicest people that I've met in Charlotte. If you're looking for somewhere to study or just hang out I would highly recommend this Barnes and Nobles.
Should have had more cashier's doing this holiday season

Love a good bookstore and this one is great. Staff is professional, courteous, and knowledgeable. Prices are fantastic with lots of deals running, always. Parking is meh. But otherwise, it's clean both inside and out and offers a variety of things for anyone coming to shop or sit in Cafe and get in some work or easy reading.
Very helpful associates.. good reasonable products.. And it's not just a store to buy books.. toys And awesome devotional books for women and men
Great as always?
Perfect place to unwind.
Love this B&N location. Always a great selection of books for children, and they do storytime on Saturdays and Sundays for the little ones.
(Translated by Google) It is a very nice place. I wish there were more options of books in Spanish  (Original) Es un sitio muy agradable. Querr√≠a que hubiese m√°s opciones de libros en Espa√±ol
Great place to come in an get work done and great reads. The iced chai tea with almond milk is one of the best I've ever had. Will come back for more soon.

I loved this store and location! They have a vast assortment of (books in ALL categories, Magazines, Gifts, Stationary Products, Visual store layout and Presentation of Books where eye catching, etc...) What put the icing on the cake for me? The STAFF is (phenomenal, knowledgeable, quick to help, knew their inventory, courteous, outstanding customer service skills) and treated me like a relative that they loved -- all the way through the purchase/checkout. üòÅüíú
Such a great anchor store for the community. Grab a latte, get a sugar high and read or converse on an escalator if you like.

Large board game section, but less books than some other stores. You can tell that's likely where they make a lot of their money. The coffee shop inside seems like a Starbucks and has the logos everywhere, but it's not Starbucks and doesn't take the app pay bbn or gift cards for starbucks.  Basically, best book store for games, not bad for books. Still pricey though. Their discount board games are usually the best buy.
Favorite place to sit and relax.
Great book deals and love the cafe
Sat in cafe to tutor. Nice environment.

This is a two story barnes and noble with a starbucks on the inside. Plenty of Starbucks seating. Escalators and elevators to the second floor where the restrooms are. They have a good selection of toys and funko pops and plenty of stationary and cards for that special someone. Great selection of books as we all know. This one does carry vinyl exclusives but a limited selection. Not the biggest Barnes and Nobles in Charlotte but definitely one you can grab a coffee, a book or your laptop and go to the second story and grab a quiet seat by the window. They also have kids activities for free if you check their calendar.
Nice place to get away
I love having the option to sit and read.
amazing place! it's so huge and theirs not just books, you'll have to check it out for yourself ‚ô°
Great selection of books and even toys   and other cool stuff. Best bookstore in Charlotte area.
Great comic books and graphic novels selection. Its worth having a membership!
Awesome selection
Very nice bookstore with helpful, courteous staff. I really loved the inviting, laid back atmosphere. Found what I needed but chose to browse around anyway.

It's refreshing to actually pick up a real book instead of reading it online. B&N is a great place to get away for a moment with a good beverage and a good book. Excellent customer service from everyone I encountered.
Excellent
Good selection of books and other things
Love books go here
üòä
This place has super nice staff. Area always clean. Great environment.
Great selection. Very clean. Friendly staff.
Love this location!
Very nice Barnes and Noble with friendly staff
Love it, since it's pretty big and there's a great selection of books
(Translated by Google) A lot. Amiability  (Original) Mucha. Amabilidad
You can find almost every book comes in your mind.

This store is nice. Its clean, quite, it's a nice place to sit and read some books. They have nice kids books and toys on sale. They also have a nice selection in the bargain books section. Everyone was very nice.
Really nice place! However,  if you want to sit and get an outlet come early ! The Starbucks staff there is really friendly, and the other staff members are really helpful!
Lovely evening hanging out here reading.

My wife loves this place. Happy wife happy life. For the most part the staff at this store are very friendly except for one grumpy older lady everyone there is very nice the prices are not bad and it's got a lot to keep everyone entertained
I like having a well stocked brick and mortar bookstore. Friendly staff, lots of seating, and a Starbucks. Only a fireplace would make it better üòâ

We love barnes and noble- they never disappoint. I enjoy nestling in a good seat and reading a book. I particularly enjoy taking my little ones and letting them explore through their favorite topics. I never leave without a book or a strategy board game.
Clean quiet good customer service,  lots of books
Books
My favorite one is at the mall so big and huge selections especially for children
Always enjoy this bookstore. One of the smaller ones but plenty of book & magazine stock. Nice cafe. On receipt got a bogo for a cookie!
Really enjoy this Barnes and Nobles since it's in the middle of everything. Good location and wide selection of books compared to the other locations.
Very well managed! ‚ò∫
Could have a wider selection.
Very helpful and I got my book on sale
Quiet relaxing and low pressure from sales staff
Clean & a good readüòâ

It provides for the basics as coffee shops go but could stand some improvements.
Fabulous service

The cafe staff is very friendly, even offering suggestions on how to turn the cookies I bought into a delicious dessert. Found everything we were looking for and more including a book light. Only complaint is that there ought to be more parking at this location, but that's not the fault of the store since it's in a town center style location.
It was a quick stop, helpful employees and a wood model train set up for our little grandson.
Beautiful bookstore! Friendly staff! Organized and clean!
The place is calm and you can read book.
Not open on the weekends despite what the web says
I found good book bargains there.
Fun
Too big.  Nice magazine select ion
I love hiding out here. Even on days where the kiddos need an outing on a rainy day the play area upstairs for them is spot on! The staff are always super helpful at this location as well.
Always a great choice for a bookstore. Organized and friendly
Great atmosphere
You gotta love books.
Good B&N location
Great selection. Right next to some of my favorite eaterys too!
Great place to relax and read.
I always leave with more books for my kids than they can read in a month.
I received excellent customer service and they took care of my problem in a very timely manner.
Such a great place‚Äî stimulating yet relaxing everyone is so friendly and helpful I spent the whole morning there!
Nice place to get a coffee and a new book.
Nice place to visit, browsing or purchasing.
Nice store, not sure of its future.
Great place so many options
Great bookstore
It's a beautiful store!
Awesome Bookstore with Coffe Shop to unwind.
Assistants at this location are hostile
One of my favorite places to read
Staff is always friendly and helpful.
Excellent staff
Great atmosphere!

Staff are so friendly here. Also, keep an eye out for coupons. Barnes and Noble run 20% off coupons, which makes most books the same price as purchasing on Amazon, but you get your book without waiting! I joined their membership too. Coupons all year and free shipping on every purchase. Keep bookstores alive!
May be the best B&N I've been to!
Nice helpful employees!
Huge bookshop with a variety of books and a nice cafe

Nothing incredible but very quaint in a nice way.
Always a neat place to go in and have a good look around. Starbucks there to help,too.

Wonderful staff members! Need more floor assistance to handle inquires.
Friendly customer service, very polite and respectful. Also a neat and organized bookstore.
